title: sam2014
author: sam2014
content: Hi, this is Guerilla way we deal in proving community managers for her clients, we all know that it's not cool just to make anyone a community manager since he/she would be representing the community. This is why we at Guerilla way have trained a league of professional community managers who can manage your community under strict supervision from the companyWe could jump on a call if interested, contact us on telegram @mic_sm
